name: Saintess Alasdair is Dead
summary:
Saintess Alasdair was hailed in Filigree and the kingdoms beyond as the reincarnation of the morning Goddess. Beautiful, pious and powerful, she was forever victorious in battle and perfect in her devotion.

But now the Saintess is dead, her body scattered over the battle field like weeds after rain.

You are Gwendolyn, the Saintess’s much less impressive sister, and your marriage to the King of Assynia will fix whatever complications the Saintess left behind.

You will not fail.
